summary: A brief email from a detective notifying an employer that one of their employees has assisted the government multiple times in an investigation, leading to missed work. The email states that prosecutors from the Southern District of New York will send a more detailed letter.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: The author of the email, notifying an employer about an employee's assistance in a government investigation.

events.title: Notification of Employee Assistance
events.description: A detective emails an employer to notify them that an employee has assisted the government multiple times in an investigation, causing the employee to miss work.

keyFacts: An employee of an unspecified organization has assisted the government multiple times in an investigation.
The assistance has caused the employee to miss work.
Prosecutors from the Southern District of New York are preparing a detailed letter about these instances to send to the employer.
